meanings.sent1: The labeler carefully placed stickers on each item.
meanings.sent2: The labeler at the library helps organize the books.
meanings.sent3: The labeler joked that they should put 'warning: may cause happiness' on their own forehead.
meanings.sent4: She was a labeler of emotions, always quick to identify how others were feeling.
meanings.sent5: The labeler's job was to bring order to chaos, one sticker at a time.

meanings.definition: A machine or device used for labeling.
meanings.sent1: The labeler in the office prints out address labels efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The labeler beeped as it applied the barcode to the package.
meanings.sent3: The labeler in the factory had a habit of sticking labels on everything, even the coffee mugs.
meanings.sent4: The labeler hummed softly as it worked, like a tiny robot with a purpose.
meanings.sent5: The labeler's precision was unmatched, ensuring every product was properly marked.
